response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would greatly benefit you as well. Given its importance, I am offering it to you at a special price of $12,000. This represents a substantial savings compared to its true worth, making it an attractive investment for you. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with this offer. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 12000}
